I personally loved their shots they were amazing.

taste

+2

Hi Readers do follow me on instagram #afewmoments_22

.

.

Masala Flips is a cute little eatery located in the busy lanes of Badi Chowdi, Sultan Bazar. This place is definitely a saviour for hunger pangs for crowd in the shopping lanes. They are serving pure vegetarian street food, fusion of Italian and Indian Street food and chaat like Pav bhaji, Garlic bread, Vada Pav, Potato twister, Sandwiches, Pizzas and more at affordable prices. Where affordable prices and good food always attract the customers, same goes with masala Flips.

I tried the following items from their menu

1. Masala Cheese Pav Bhaji - I must say it's one of the best pav bhaji I have tried in recent times. The butter was...read more
